list_definition.definition: to damage or ruin; to make bad or useless

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If you touch that drawing, you’ll spoil it.

list_definition.mean_english: làm hư, làm hại tính cách
list_definition.definition: to give (a child etc) too much of what he wants and possibly make his character, behaviour/behavior etc worse by doing so

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They spoil that child dreadfully and she’s becoming unbearable!
